collectible.title: Wayfinder Charm
collectible.subtitle: An unbreakable connection.
collectible.text:
A star-shaped lucky charm used to provide luck to travelers. It is designed to resemble the paopu fruit, which is said to tie friends together. Aqua made one for herself and her friends, Terra and Ventus, before she and Terra took the Mark of Mastery exam.

Wearing this charm in a game with Aqua may cause her to try and appeal to you more directly.
collectible.unlock: Win your first game against Aqua (Kingdom Hearts).
